data.name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Emissary Predator DLC Pack
data.detailed_description:
For years this Predator remained hidden, carefully studying the practices and tech of modern human warriors. Gradually, he stole and constructed similar armor and gear and used this resemblance to frighten human warriors, leaving them stunned and perplexed by his unique, yet familiar, armor.

Now, you can become this feared and calculated hunter with the Emissary Predator DLC pack. This DLC pack includes the Emissary Predator premium class.
data.about_the_game:
For years this Predator remained hidden, carefully studying the practices and tech of modern human warriors. Gradually, he stole and constructed similar armor and gear and used this resemblance to frighten human warriors, leaving them stunned and perplexed by his unique, yet familiar, armor.

Now, you can become this feared and calculated hunter with the Emissary Predator DLC pack. This DLC pack includes the Emissary Predator premium class.
data.short_description: Strike fear into your foes as the calculated new Emissary Predator. This DLC pack includes the Emissary Predator premium class.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD R9 280x
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5930K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 or AMD R9 Fury X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Predator: Hunting Grounds - Emissary Predator DLC Pack

subs.option_text: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Emissary Predator DLC Pack - 229₴

content_descriptors.notes: Predator: Hunting Grounds is a first/third-person hunter-shooter where players take the role of a human mercenary or the Predator. The frenzied combat features instances of intense violence highlighted by frequent gunfire, explosions, screams of pain, blood and gore, and instances of dismemberment and mutilation. Some maps show skinned corpses with partial nudity. One mission chain sees the mercenaries locate and destroy packages of drugs in a cartel compound. Dialogue includes examples of Strong Language.
